mdRecord.dcterms:description: Facade, Le Hall de la Chanson

... named after a type of cattle that used to be transported here to the slaughterhouse behind the Grande Halle in Villette prior to the area being turned into a cultural centre. Now a small (140-seat) music venue. -- https://www.eutouring.com/le_hall_de_la_chanson.html [work]
